video_prompt: Dissolving steam rises from a teacup, revealing miniature figures sunbathing and swimming on a vibrant, shifting island. A small wooden boat glides. Palm trees sway as birds fly against a dynamic sunset, its colors pulsing and fading.
image_prompt: Generate a hyperrealistic, whimsical image of a miniature tropical island paradise meticulously constructed within a white teacup and saucer, set on a rustic wooden surface. The island features sandy beaches with tiny people sunbathing and swimming, a tranquil turquoise "ocean" reflecting a vibrant sunset, lush green foliage including abundant palm trees, and two rustic thatched huts. A small wooden boat floats on the water. The background showcases a breathtaking sunset with golden and orange hues, silhouetted palm trees in the corners, and parakeets in flight. Faint wisps of steam rise from the teacup, adding a magical, dreamlike quality.
refined_video_prompt: Steam dissolves and rises, revealing miniature figures animatedly sunbathing and swimming as the vibrant island shifts. A wooden boat glides. Palm trees sway while birds fly, silhouetted against a dynamic sunset where colors pulse and fade.
